sourceMeaningMnemonic: <radical>Alcohol</radical> is a good <radical>teacher</radical> on the process of <kanji>fermentation</kanji>.
meaningInfo: Because alcohol is so good and addicting, people will work extra hard to ferment it properly. This makes it a good teacher to learn about fermentation. People are motivated to figure it out!
readingMnemonic: Using <kanji>fermentation</kanji>, you are indeed making some alcohol. It will be drunk at a party put on by Emperor <ja><reading>こう</reading>いち</ja>.
readingInfo: You are fermenting thousands of bottles of alcohol for Emperor <ja>こういち</ja>'s big party.
